Border

Use border utilities to quickly style the border and border-radius of an element. Great for images, buttons, or any other element. Read the Official Bootstrap Documentation for a full list of instructions and other options.

Set/Unset Border

The following border utilities classes will add border to any side of an element.

<span class="border"></span>
<span class="border-top"></span>
<span class="border-end"></span>
<span class="border-bottom"></span>
<span class="border-start"></span>
<span class="border-0"></span>
<span class="border-top-0"></span>
<span class="border-end-0"></span>
<span class="border-bottom-0"></span>
<span class="border-start-0"></span>



Border Color

Change the border color using utilities built on our theme colors.

<span class="border border-primary"></span>
<span class="border border-secondary"></span>
<span class="border border-success"></span>
<span class="border border-danger"></span>
<span class="border border-warning"></span>
<span class="border border-info"></span>
<span class="border border-light"></span>
<span class="border border-dark"></span>
<span class="border border-white"></span>



Border Width

Change the border width using utilities to change the border thickness.

<span class="border border-1"></span>
<span class="border border-2"></span>
<span class="border border-3"></span>
<span class="border border-4"></span>
<span class="border border-5"></span>



Border Radius

Add classes to an element to easily round its corners.

<span class="border rounded"></span>
<span class="border rounded-top"></span>
<span class="border rounded-end"></span>
<span class="border rounded-bottom"></span>
<span class="border rounded-start"></span>
<span class="border rounded-circle"></span>
<span class="border rounded-pill"></span>



Set/Unset Border Border Color Border Width Border Radius
